name: Turbo ’84: Bitcoin Joyride
description:
Do you want to earn Bitcoin by playing games? Play Turbo 84 and you are entered into a free to enter prize draw to win a Bitcoin prize!

- HOW TO PLAY -
Drive as fast as you can through this insane lane changing game! Drive through as many obstacles as you can, picking up speed as you go. Players are judged on their Top Speed and Furthest distance driven.

As you drive, collect tokens you find on the road. Use them to buy more cars and upgrade your engine!

- HOW TO EARN BITCOIN -
This game contains a prize draw in which you can win bitcoin/satoshi via a raffle, paid over The Lightning Network. You must be 18 or over to enter the draw.

To enter the draw you collect THNDR Tickets. Each one counts as an entry to the daily draw in which you can win a bitcoin prize. If you win you can cash out instantly to one of these supported Bitcoin wallet apps with 'Lightning Network' support; ZEBEDEE, Wallet of Satoshi, Breez, Blue Wallet, Bitcoin Lightning Wallet and Zeus.

Note: THNDR Tickets are a virtual currency, not a cryptocurrency. They have no monetary value, cannot be purchased nor are they transferable.

The game contains no crypto currency, wallet or related technology. All prizes are paid from THNDR LTD to the winner, upon you tapping the 'claim all' button on the prize screen. THNDR LTD will send the small amounts of Bitcoin winnings (known as satoshi) via The Lightning Network.

Please note: Apple is not a sponsor nor is involved in any way with this prize draw. The promoter is solely responsible for organising the prize draw and providing the prize if won by an eligible entrant. The prizes won are not products of Apple nor are they related to Apple in any way.
